post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
Dear Brendan,
I have been conducting a search for one of our clients in the Banking sector and came across your profile in our database.
The skills and experience required are specialized and I'm hoping to network with you to find the right match for our client.
Feel free to email me your resume or forward this email to those you think would be qualified and interested in the following role.
Our client, a leading SW consulting company has an immediate contract requirement for a software build speciaist (manager).
Responsible for setting up virtual machines/database web servers in a virtual (Linux) environment using:
Maven Artifactory Hudson Subversion
If the person can build and deploy a java based application to a tomcat or web logic environment then all the better.
I have few other contract and permanent opportunities within the banking sector. Kindly let me know of you availability and we can discuss details.
Regards,
Mansoor Malik
Resource Manager
ProVision IT Resources Office: 416.777.1708 x226
Toll Free: 1.866.797.7717 x226
post.title: SW Build Specialist, contract
